com.aston.group.stationdefender.utils.resources

Interface Inventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerInventory

    public interface Inventory
    Inventory is a storage place for items that the player can use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds all given Items from the Inventory

        Removes all Items from the Inventory

        Item getItem(int index)
        Returns an Item at a specific number in the Inventory
        Parameters:
        index - The number of the queue to get the Item from
        Returns:
        The Item at the given queue index number

      • getItemById

        Returns an Item at a specific id in the Inventory
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Removes an Item from the PlayerInventory by the Item ID

      • getAllItemsById

        com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Item> getAllItemsById(int id)
        Returns all Items from the Inventory by a specific ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to get all items by
        Returns:
        All Items that contain the given ID

      • removeAllItemsById

        void removeAllItemsById(int id)
        Removes all items from the Inventory by a given ID
        Parameters:
        id - The Item ID to remove all items by
